import { Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";

# DatePicker
```import { DatePicker } from "../../../Components/Atom";```

DatePicker is input to choose date. if you need to adding validation with className method using props `inputClassName`.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-date-picker--basic" />
</Preview>

## Stories
### Status
Add **status** to your `DatePicker`: success, danger, or warning.
<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-date-picker--status" />
</Preview>


### Disabled
**disabled** input of `DatePicker`

  <Story id="atom-date-picker--disabled" />
</Preview>
